channel.title: New Court Wizard
channel.description:
Hello,
I really like the new Court Wizard. I just have one minor suggestion. The day time Clear Mind ability I've noticed is hidden/disabled when a trial occurs and cannot be used after the trial is over. I would like to be able to cast the ability either during the trial or afterwards depending on the outcome of the trial just like the Prince Jailing ability. Sometimes I'm unable to cast it at all because people get voted up so quickly. Thanks.

item.title: New Court Wizard
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Also during the day they should be able to change target so if they missclick, or want to change it

Read full topic

item.title: New Court Wizard

item.description:
Yes this should be added bcs a sheriff outed unseen to king and i didn’t know they were sheriff.They outed themselves after trial to me to clear mind.Since I couldn’t do it i swapped them and got him killed.
